data.Name: David Gray
data.Bio: There are multiple artists by the name of David Gray, including: 1) a British singer-songwriter 2) an Italian disco musician 3) an American singer-songwriter 4) drummer for the British blackened death metal band Akercocke 5) a musician from South Africa 1) David Gray is a British singer-songwriter born on June 13, 1968 in Sale, United Kingdom. He released his first studio album in 1993 and received worldwide attention after the release of White Ladder six years later in 1999. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: David Gray
data.Description:
DAVID GRAY at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on July 22, 2021 has been rescheduled to July 21, 2022.

There is nothing you need to do as your tickets will be valid for the new date.


AEG Presents is thrilled to announce DAVID GRAY live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on Thursday, July 21st, 2022.
